content.detailedDescription: I was talking with my son on our front porch-he was facing west and i was facing east.Where we live we have a good view of the western sky,as i was talking to him (facing him) he was looking above me.He wasnt paying any attention to me as he raised his hand and pointed-he says what the hell is that?And turns his head fast as if tracking something.I turn and miss it of course.He says it was bigger than any star in the sky and it moved fast up and away at an angle.Thats it.
content.summary: Bright light-suddenly moved very fast up and away

content.detailedDescription:
Wednesday april 6, 2011 approximately 8:30pm cst. i was stopped at a stop sign at the intersection of 8300 and parallel parkway, kansas city, kansas looking towards the north.  i saw 5 amber glowing lights in a "v" formation going from the northeast to the southwest. i thought these were not faa standard lighting for aircraft, and the fact that they were amber glowing lights with no strobe or flashing effect (constant glow).  my next thought was to get to higher ground to get a better visual of the event.  then i realized i had to drive the 3 blocks west on parallel to get my camera to document the event immediately.  upon entering the garage door, i ran into the house and had my wife retrieve the camera telling her "there are ufo's flying over the house right now".  we went into the driveway and could see above and slightly north of our home two amber lights and started taking camera video.
the objects passed directly above us with no sound at all. they were in a constant distance from each other.  as it went over, the back light seemed to radiate around the other light as they headed in tandem southwest over parallel parkway. the farther south they went the leading light seemed to flicker and disappear, then the following light dissipated the same fashion.
my feeling during the event was "i need to get home to get my camera to document as it goes over my neighborhood".  my wife got on the internet and tried to see if anyone else was seeing this phenomenon.  she ended up calling fox 4 television to see if anyone else had reported this, they wanted the video.  it was posted to facebook, no one called back to confirm our information.
content.summary: 5 amber lights in a "v" shape over kansas city kansas

content.detailedDescription:
On monday night (04/04/2011) i was on my front patio watching the stars at 2200 hrs, and saw a very bright star-like object hovering what looked like about 1000 feet. i got my telescope out to look at it closer, and noticed that it was circular with rotating white, blue, green and red lights around the sides of it. i watched it for about 10 minutes before it disappeared over the santa cruz mountains. the area where i saw it was west of the quarry in cuppertino. before it disappeared, i also saw it shooting short bursts of what looked like blue lightning from the bottom of it.

this repeated again tuesday night, same time and area, and lasted about 10 minutes.

last night (weds 04/06/2011), it was different. i saw a very bright star-like object hovering over the same area (over the cuppertino quarry). it was too low to be a "star", but hovering so it wasn't a plane either. i got my tele out again to take a look at it, and it was definatly a triangle with bright lights (one at each tip of the triangle). it moved slightly to the left, then right, but hovered over the same area. as i was watching it through my tele, the lights all went out on it, but you could see four "dots" of lights lined up next to it. then, while i was still looking through my tele, the three bright white lights came back on. i watched it for about 15 minutes, then the lights went out again, and didn't come back on. at this point, the line of "dots" also disappeared from view.

now that the weather is starting to get warmer, i am going to start camping outside on the weekends to keep a good watch on the sky. to my friends and family, i have been refering to these objects as "my friends". as in, "my friends are back!". and no..... i would never use a flashlight or laser to try to get their attention!!!
content.summary: Third night in a row..... yes, again!

content.detailedDescription: I went out with my dog to see the supermoon. it was too low on the horizen or something  and cloudy. instead i saw a ufo shaped like the body of a dragonfly without wings. it was glowing red like the embers of a fire and its light fluctuated like embers also. it was in the southeast sky about the distance i would normally see a jet. it moved slowly westward till it got near the top of my big pine tree and got small and disapeared. it didn't really look like it just went behind a cloud so i moved over trying to see it but it was gone. i think i watched it for 1-5 minuets. i've checked the files on mufon for awhile to see if anyone else saw it to no avail so i thought i'd better report it.
content.summary: Spotted ufo shaped like the body of a dragonfly with no wings, glowing red like embers of fire. in southeast sky. hight of average jet. moved  westward.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello i'm submiting this report for my brother..Because he is unaware of the available resources for such events. i've spoken with him at great lenth and he has agreed to speak to someone as long as his identity would remain anonymous. he is very cautious of who he talks to because of the negative stigma that is associated with things like this. he knows i am a firm "believer", but still waited until 8:45pm to call me. he doesn't want to become some media punching bag where he could possibly loose his job after being humiliated..He simply wants to know if there were any other similar reports in the area at that time.
    he knows what he saw ..And i believe him
content.summary: Clear skies that day,object was slow moving, with a rotating wobble,no sound, high rate of speed at acceleration.

content.detailedDescription: The object flew directly above and over me, above approximately 3,000 ft. upon watching it, it illuminated very brightly within 8 seconds and went star-like again. about 10 seconds later it illuminated again. like it knew i was watching it pass... i say they're common type because, it's happened time and time again... but not every night. some people think from my description they're satellites, well they're not. these have flown under 500 ft and have flown far under 100 ft... that time it was almost direct contact... they appear like spheres of light when close. many strange things have happened other then that but i'm still not sure if it's a secret human operation or it's something entirely else. maybe in time i'll discover the undeniable truth. ps. there is a military installation just outside the city. there was a regular jet aircraft making it across the sky before the sighting. the aircraft was heading west while the ufo was heading north.
content.summary: Common star-like object heading north, illuminated a few times

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend robert were sitting in my car outside my house just before midnight when we saw a strange object coming down from the sky. it seemed to be coming toward us in fairly fast rate.  it stopped approximately 500yards from us and began to hover across the neighborhood.  the color of the lights were red and blue. there was sound to it as it traveled. we heard and felt vibrations (humming sound) that were going high and low. this object was seen and felt previously approximately 1 year ago near the same neighborhood causing trees to vibrate. im not sure what it was at first. i though it was a helicopter or plane since the airport is close to us but, this object was very different.  after looking at it for about 15-30mins the object headed out of view.
content.summary: Object was hovering and very quiet.  blinking red and blue lights.  this object had four lights with a blacked middle section

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were setting at the great escape movie lot in nitro, wv.  we were watching the sun set and watching planes lay chemtrails in the sky. then, a metallic oval/sphere shaped object appeared out of no where about as high as the planes were flying. the sun was extremely reflecting off the object. the planes around the object were reflecting as well but, no where near the intensity as the object. the object started fading in and out rapidly.  (note: the planes were leaving exhaust trails and chemtrails. the object did not.) then the object disappeared into thin air.
content.summary: Metallic shiny object in nitro wv

content.detailedDescription: On a morning with blue skies and only a few white clouds, but otherwise a crystal clear day, i thought i saw a blimp flying overhead, but there was something odd about it. there was no ad on it, normally i see hood blimps, but this was plain so i looked again more closely. i am nearsighted so maybe i just was not seeing it correctly, but it did not seem wide enough to be a blimp and it did not seem to have a cabin underneath it, nor the little tail pieces that normally stick out the back. i thought at first of a white pill capsule the way it was so rounded out but with a shadow in the middle like it had been cut a little but still connected, but in some way, it was more cigar shaped the way that one end was somewhat thicker than the other. it almost did not seem to be moving, but maybe it was just moving slowly, i can not be sure since i was not still at the time. i had to stare at it for a minute to take it in but after turning away for a moment, looking back, i could not spot it again. i will reiterate that i am nearsighted and it was first thing in the morning for me and it happened too quickly for me to even think of recording it before it was gone from sight. so there is not much to go on other than it was essentially a crystal clear day and i know what blimps look like and after a first glance i was no longer certain that it was one. i will have my doubts as much as the next person, but the part of me that questioned what i saw is what brought me here, but i'd like to go about my life as normal, as though it was nothing. i do not want to get wrapped up in conspiracies and beliefs in otherworldly beings so i would like to remain anonymous. i just thought it would be good to post this in case anyone else had seen it and also thought it seemed strange. i am attaching a picture of a foam pillow that looks a bit like a pill like i described. it is not exactly what it looked like but it should do. thank you for reading.
content.summary: Blimp? no ad, no underneath, shadow in middle, more cigar shaped. ufo?

content.detailedDescription: At around 9:30pm i walked outside to enjoy the night air, it's around 65 degrees and clear enough to see the milky way. i was standing on the front porch steps and looked south out over lake greeson and a flashing light caught my eye. it flashed white about 3 times (maybe once per second) so i just thought it was a plane but then i noticed it turned into 2 flashing white lights. one all i saw was a steady red light with a flashing white light heading south towards the nashville,ar direction and was behind the tree line pretty fast. the other was heading north in my direction with the bright flashing white light with a cluster of what looked like three red lights on the left side and a cluster of three blue lights on the right. i could not make out a shape but it was close enough i should have heard something if it was a single engine plane. in the skyline it took it about 3-4 minutes to travel fifty or so yards then it turned west and went out of site over the trees. again there was not any sound, it was so quiet i could hear a vehicle driving on the mountain across the lake and air liners that frequently fly over.
content.summary: Cluster of red and blue lights with one flashing white light

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were eating dinner near the window, which overlooks the tualatin valley, and suddenly she turns to me and says, "whoa! what is that?". as i turn and looked, i saw what appeared to be a perfectly spherical ball of bright white light, hovering stationary approximately 15 to 25 degrees above the southern horizon. the ball was 3-4 times larger than a bright star in diameter, and appeared to be perfectly stationary. the sphere hovered in place for about three minutes, remaining mostly bright white, although it would briefly transition to a yellow/amber color, before switching back to bright white. after about three minutes, the ball of light suddenly dimmed in intensity to approximately 1/4th of it's original brightness. at this point, the object appeared to drift slowly west for 45 seconds before it suddenly disappeared. no remnant of the ball of light was seen again after this. the sky was completely overcast, so what we saw was below the cloud deck. the described object appeared to be hovering over the beaverton, tigard area, possibly a little further south and/or west. the sphere was well defined and no faa/aeronautical lights could be seen by either witness. no sound was heard from the object either. neither witness had previously seen anything like this in the sky before. the sudden disappearance of the brilliant ball of light was abrupt and perplexing. all of these events were observed before it got dark at 7:53 pm pst from the west hills of portland, or.
content.summary: Stationary ball of light

content.detailedDescription:
This happened a few years ago but i remember it precisely. i have retold the event enough times that the memory sits very clear in my mind.
i was driving the car with my mother in the passenger seat. i was about 16 years old, learning to drive. i think we were going to the mall and we were stopped at a red light. i'm not sure of the time, but it was daylight. a cloudy day but bright and a nice day. lots of cars around.

i am just spacing out, waiting. we are both just kinda looking around. i'm looking at the sky when i see a few clouds split apart slowly, and a disc appears in the distance close to the ground. then a beam of light appears from the open space between the clouds. the beam is sort of thin, but easily noticeable. the disc floated up the beam of light and into the clouds. then, the clouds closed. 

while this was happening, i was just staring at it, and i didn't know what to think. afterwards, i composed myself and asked my mom if she saw that. she did. i asked, what was that? she did not know..  i wondered if the people in the other cars saw it. i wanted to ask them but obviously that wasn't possible. i tried looking at the people to see their reactions but couldn't really tell.
content.summary: I saw clouds open and a disc appear. the disc floated up into the clouds via a beam of lights. then the clouds closed back up.

content.detailedDescription: Was stopped, and started when it was seen to move with an intense and constant brightness. i'm not about speed but it was q was fast.
content.summary: An intense and constant brightness.

content.detailedDescription:
On the 9th of aug 2005, evening 5:45 pm. a group of 5 spinning & shuffling ufo light balls( closed together) released 2(?) small orbs on top of my roof. i stood right under light balls and took 5 pictures for them. between those 5 pictures my camera was twice affected by a strong electro-magnetic field. it made the screen of camera viewfinder turning black (i also heard the ���pop��� sound from the camera). i have had to wait for few seconds for the viewfinder to work again, then i can look thorough the viewfinder. the object suddenly turned into a colorful electro- fog and disappeared. 

this case is one of my long term visitation, more details from: *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
content.summary: Sphere ufos released small orbs & magnetic

content.detailedDescription:
I first noticed this object a couple of years ago by a friend of mine who pointed it out too me at about 12:00am or so.  i see it at various times of night at different points in the sky.  in the past i have watched it drop below the horizon and rise up again with in seconds.  a group of us watched this event together moving in small circles as well.

but the rescent events took place as i was outside my house actually looking for this object, as i said i have noticed it for years.  and, every since, i go out and look up in the sky to show others as well.  this object pulsates as it gets brighter and dimmer.  i see it every morning at around 6am just before (and in the same direction as the rising sun.)

i have looked on the internet and everyone around the world is noticing it now.  some say its venus, the spacestation, or planet x.  i am no expert on astronmy but i am sure this is not venus or the spacestation and i don't know what the hell planet x is?  

this is the brightest object in the sky other than the full moon.  its size in comparison too the full moon is about a quarter of the size of the full moon.  if i never seen it move below the horizon in the past and rise up again in seconds i would say its venus but since i have seen this i am not covinced that this is venus.  the object is only lost due too the rising suns brightness.  and evetually fades out slowly.  also i have footage of it (but no cable too connect to my computer to down load it) and as i zoom in there is a crater like object at lower left corner of glowing star like object. the top 1/4th of the object is a black straight line covering the entire top 1/4th.  this object goes from the horizon up too the 10:30 or 11:00 o'clock postion in the sky in a matter of 2 hours or so. if you could help fill me in on this i would appreciate it.  i assure if you go out at 6am or so and look east (preferably with a telescope) you will see it, i assure you.  

everyone is taking notice and an answer needs to be given soon.  i would be glad to meet anyone for mufon at any time(as long as they come too me) but i don't want any government officials contacting me at all.  as i do not trust them at all.

thanks for your time and please contact me anytime day or night,

sincerly, 

*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: In eastern skies we are seeing a bright object that rises up very quickly

content.detailedDescription:
I was with my mom,dad,and brother at the park getting ready to watch the fireworks display at the park. i was waiting a while,looked up and saw a glowing red orb floating in the sky. at firt i thought it was a chinese lantere attached to a ballon full of hellium but i noticed it movie in a sraight line and not going higher in the sky like all ballons do.It past by and went away.Thenabout 3-4 or 5 more come from the place the last orb disappeared at.I knew that those couldnt be fireworks or cinese lanterns with a light in them attached to a balloon.Theythan flickered out after awhile.I think they are ufos.No kind of fireworks go in a straight line while staying at the same altitude and not going higher or lower.Too bad no one else beleives they were ufos.Well i dont know if they do.It wasn't in the newspaper thats for sure.Im now excited to go back on july 4th to see if i can see them again.I thought i was in a ufo free place but i guess i was wrong.
                                                     
                                                      signed,
                                                       c.W.
content.summary: 4th of july ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my back porch and i observed an illuminated object in the sky hovering over a location in the distance for apprx 23 minutes...For a very short moment it moved north a little then south a little.  it seemed a circular object at first but would take on a more cigar shape form as the lumination of it changed. there was no sound and at first i thought it was a star or planet until i noticed the short movements and the lumination changing from circular to cigar shaped.  i wasn't scared just fascinated.  i snapped a couple shots them went into the house to call a sister nearby...When i went back out it was gone.
content.summary: Observed illuminated hovering object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was coming back from visiting family in las vegas. it was about 7:55 or 8:10 in the night. i was looking out on the side of the road towards the mountains and there was lots of planes in the skies that night. i was feeling angry because we had to leave and the fact that we could have left on monday. i saw a triangle shaped craft that was like about 700 or 800 feet high. this happened while we were in the car and my dad,mom,sister,brother, and myself who were there too. my sister was the one that noticed it first because she was amazed at the amount of planes that night. this triangle thing that i saw was just there and not moving and it had three white lights at each angle. it was strange because this thing wasn't moving and all the other planes were. and about 25 minutes my mom noticed like flashing lights on the bushes to the side of the car and she pointed to me what she was seeing and about 30 seconds later all these small lights started popping out of no where and it was really weird because there was no one on the side of the road that night. at first i thought i was seeing things but everyone in the car saw it. later on we told a few people what we had seen and they told us someone was experimenting o the bushes....I thought thats impossible because i know exactly what i saw. but i guess that about it i think if people were to ask me questions about it i could explain it better.
content.summary: A triangle and later on weird flashing lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching a movie monday eve, 4/4/2011, and fell asleep. when i woke up, it was approximately 1:30 am (tuesday am). after i woke up, i realized i had not let my dog out to do her business, so i opened my back door and turned the outside light on to watch her, as i live on the edge of town, not in a subdivision, and there are other critters around. as i looked out, my eye caught an object to the east with multiple color lights coming towards me, at a very low altitude. there is a meadow or field of several hundred acres behind my house, so i have an unobstructed view, there are trees in my yard also. i observed the object for probably 10 seconds and i turned out the outside light. i also heard at least one helicopter, though i did not see it. at this point, the object, was huge, much larger than any airplane i have ever seen. i was standing in the doorway in my underwear, and it was quite cool out, around 38 degrees (we had a cold front move in that afternoon), so i decided to run in my house, put on some clothes and go back outside, which probably took around 10 seconds, and i actually ended up with some shorts on and one shoe on by the time i got back outside. the object had moved over the house next door, and was still flying low, around 2000' or lower, and continued to move west, i was now looking at the back side of the object where it was quite clear it was some type of triangle shaped object, and there were no lights on the back side of it. i observed it, mostly through trees now and followed it as it continued west.

i ran out in my front yard and my view was limited due to trees, though
i did notice another object, a single light, like a satellite if i were looking up in the sky (i am an amateur astronomer)to the south, moving north quite rapidly, and it began to turn west towards the object. at this point, i could not see much, due to trees and the main object moving out of my vision.

i am outside at night quite frequently, observing the sky, sometimes with my telescope, sometimes with high powered binoculars, so i know the sky here quite well, and the star movements etc. dfw airport is approximately 30 miles south and a little west of my location, and fort worth alliance airport is also about 30 miles south west of me, so i am quite familiar with the traffic patterns, mostly are to the south of me, and there would not be much, if any commercial traffic at 1:30 am. 

facts of my sighting:

(1)i did hear at least one helicopter, though i did not see it.

(2) the object was flying quite low, much lower than any flights going to dfw, between 1000-2000 feet. 

(3)there were multiple color lights on the front of the object, i remember seeing red, lots of blue lights, yellow and green lights.

(4) i did see another object (light) to the south that was for sure moving towards the object, quite rapidly.

(5) there was a kind of loud hissing noise when the object was flying over.

i was quite excited after the sighting, having trouble getting back to sleep, however, i had decided yesterday, tuesday, to not report it. i changed my mind today, as i thought by chance, some one else might have seen it also.

i obviously do not know what this object was, it was probably 3 times the size of most commercial airliners, and in that i live in an area where the military industrial complex is prevalent, i lean towards some prototype secret flying machine.
content.summary: Large triangle  object with multiple colors of lights flying low, around 2000 ft heading west almost over my house

content.detailedDescription: I was at the grand canyon on spring break in 2006 with my uncle. it had been very hazy that day and into the night. it was my second trip to the canyon, as i previously visited 3 years prior (that time it was clear and you could see every star in the sky, very spectacular).  anyway we were taking a walk around the south rim at around 9-10pm. you couldn't see many stars as moist as it was outside. all of the sudden a bright white light caught my eye off to the northeast. i initially thought it was a plane with its landing lights on, being as bright and obvious as it was. it looked to be maybe 80 to 100 miles away to the northeast. i watched it for a good 10-15 seconds, then, from a standstill, it darted off to the north at an unhumanly fast speed and quickly disappeared.
content.summary: Bright white light

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the pbs documentary when i noticed something odd in the video.  at 13:25 into the video something odd seems to appear from the bottom left and move toward the right.  at 13:28 exactly it appears to be going over the back of the aircraft.  i just wanted to know if you guys have ever debunked this video.  i just thought it was odd.

here is the link to the video.

http://www.Pbs.Org/wgbh/nova/space/crash-flight-447.Html

13:25 the object appears from the botton left then moves toward the right.  at 13:28 the scene switches to something else but if you stop it at 13:28 looks like it was going over the aircraft and not under.
content.summary: Pbs documentary of air france 447

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a jet coming from the north off my deck in my backyard. it was being followed by a salmon colored metallic vehicle that was directly behind and below the jet. i could hear the jet and see it's contrails. the jet was in a very low altitude, evidently just taking off from the airport in that direction. (i am in the flightpath here)
i could see details of the jet clearly, the object was more rounded on top and flatter on the bottom. the ends were rounded and smaller than the middle, more or less cigar shaped. i could hear no sound from it and there were no wings or tail or any contrail visible. in fact it looked smooth with no other details visible.
the object was going exactly the same speed as the jet and definitely too close for comfort. the crew surely had to be aware of this object, especially since it was at least as big as the jet.
i called out to my sister and her boyfriend to see this but they didn't hear me.
i watched the jet and the object as they passed the east side of my house. at that point i ran in to get my camera and onto the front porch to take a video, but the object and the jet were out of sight.
this all took place in the span of about 5 minutes.
it was an eerie experience!
content.summary: Seen from my deck salmon colored object following jet from the north

content.detailedDescription: I'm eastern time so it was just about the end of dusk, i was outside smoking a cigarette looking up at the stars/moon as i usually do whilst smoking.I saw this object flying really low in the sky (750-1250 feet) and making no noise whatsoever. no jet engines and i think i would have even been able to hear a propeller if it was a small aircraft. anyway, it looked sort of triangular in shape with three lights on it, two where white and one was green. hard to judge its size but i would estimate it was about 60x80 yards. i saw it fly behind two symmetrical buildings, so my view was obscured for a few seconds, then it passed by the two buildings. i looked away for a few seconds, then saw it fly by the buildings in the same area and direction i had seen it fly not 2 seconds ago. i don't know of any human made craft that could change direction like that. i got this sense like "that's not human" when i saw it, this gut reaction. i know it won't mean much here but my intuition is usually quite sharp. after i had this feeling like i saw something unusual and somewhat exciting.
content.summary: Triangular ufo, 2 white/1 green light

content.detailedDescription:
First seen object from my peripheral vision. object was directly overhead moving from north to south in an erratic jumping zig-zag pattern. appeared to have 5 lights. starting on the left going to the right they were white, red, white, red, white.  due to the low luminosity of the lights when compared to an airliners lights it was either at very high altitude or dimly lit. the object moved from directly over me to disappear behind the mountain peaks in roughly 3-4 seconds. the jumping zig zag pattern made it hard to follow by eye. i could not discern any fuselage or wings nor was there any sound. 
the sky was clear and cloudless with stars being very pronounced.
i am an ex army air crew member and have several hours in the air. i am well aware of the performance restrictions of current aircraft and their lighting configurations. if it were not for the snapping zig zag pattern of the flight path as well as the speed i would have written it off as a high altitude flight probably military. for the same reasons i dismissed the idea of a meteor.
content.summary: Chevron of lights

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at the moon off my back porch. i took notice of all the stars and as i was looking at the stars i turned to the left and saw 4 very large bright bright white lights, it was rectagular shape (long straight across) and it looked like the 4 lights lined up next to each other (with a little space in between) as if it was one large object . at first it looked as if it was still, so i ran into get my camera (because it was close by) turned it on ,went to take the picture and the batteries acted like they died, you know the sound of the camera when the batteries are dying, so at that time the object had turned to go toward the front of my property,so i ran out that way , just got a slight look at the side, it was gone! it probably all lasted about 2 minutes. so then i thought let me check my camera to make sure i didn't get a picture, then i thought oh i won't be able to because it probably dead, well it wasn't, just for the heck of it i took a couple of pictures of my floor after that and it didn't die. hmmm, it looked as if it was probably 600 - 800 ft away. i live in airville , in between delta and fawngrove ,pa. its also called mason dixon line. border of md and pa. i would love to know of any other reporting of this. i have never seen anything like this before. i am kind of sorry now that i wasted that time going getting my camera when i could have watched it more to be able to have a better description of it . but i was excited.
content.summary: Rectagular with 4 large bright white lights

content.detailedDescription: Hi i saw yesterdayi saw 3 ufos in dthe sky. they flotee then zaped from place to place mimicing each uther. if you mhave eney info plaze email me at *(wit's email address deleted--cms/sg) i whas in my home and outside at the time. i saw them shot throw the sky when i first saw it i new it was a ufo.It was difredt coler and very quite.The way i lost sight of the object was it all 3 all of a suden dhot into the are plz emaol me if you have an idea of what it cold be thx
content.summary: Sircle arowned 3 of them

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from ogden utah on the i-15,i was with my daughter,friend and brother in-law.Getting close to st. george around 2to3 hundred miles to go  i started to get sleepy, every one else was tired so i told them that i was going to pull over and rest. as i closed my eyes a bright light came over our car, i could not move or talk, i was scared, a tall suffer kind of guy approached our car and i began to float out, he wore a dark swimsiut and told me that everythung was alright, not to be scared. that they just wanted to do some experiments, i saw 7 to 8 tall figures standing behind him, i saw the car clock and it read 1207. i saw my brother in-law next to me leaning against the passenger door ,my friend and daughter wre in the back asleep.The next thing i remember was being placed back into the car. everthing went silent and then i sceamed, everybody was screaming for me to get the car out of there.
i would like to talk to someone about this, hopefully under hypnosis. 
this happened in 1987 and every time i want to talk about this the others don't. if we can talk i know the oters will talk also.
can you please help!. please contact!
content.summary: Dirving home stpoped to rest ,bright light ,floated out, told everything was o.K put back in car.

content.detailedDescription:
Around 5 days after the main airport in norway was closed for 2 hours because of a ufo hovering in 8000 feet, i took this picture on my roof, i'm a proffesional aviation photographer, and had a plan to take picture of a plane coming in for landing at an airport 30 miles from where i live, i had a plan to take a picture with long shutterspeed so i could get the red stripes from the beacons on the plane across the picture with the stars in background, but another light around 2-3 miles away from me in around 2000-3000 feet of height caught my eyes, i then forget about the plane and put camera in position and took what i think is a clear proof of a ufo, i have the original raw file, which can not be done any changes too, but the picture i show you here i have put my copyrights on, for safety and copyright reasons, i was looking at this object for around 2-3 minutes i think, and then it suddenly took off in a speed and climb rate not possible for any aircraft i know about, and i know a lot of aircraft types,because of my work.
the picture is taken from my home adress, the small dots you see around on the picture is the stars, also this gives a good view of the size of this ufo, the area was complete silent.
content.summary: Ufo in the skies over norway

content.detailedDescription:
Note: this was called in to the asssistant state director, margie kay today by phone.  the witness wishes to remain anonymous. i have written down exactly what the witness said:  

i was awakened at 3:15 am this morning by my german shepard, who came to get me out of bed. she would not stop barking at something in the back yard. she wanted me to go to the back door. as i walked through the kitchen i stopped.  i could see a whitish/bluish bright light coming in the window in the door and the back windows.  i had never seen any lights like this and thought it must be a helicopter looking for someone.  i did not hear any sound, though, and thought that was odd.  

i am a retired police officer and at that point, i felt uneasy, so i went back to the bedroom to got my gun, which is always loaded.  i then went back to the kitchen and opened the back door, at that point the light just blinked out. i looked around the yard and looked up where the light was, and saw a very dark dull black triangle shape above me. it had no lights on at that point.  the object appeared to measure the width of my yard (50 ft.) just floated there, unmoving.  

i heard a noise towards the back fence and looked in that direction. then i rmembered my flashlight and went to get it from the kitchen drawer, when i heard a sound in the hallway behind me.  it sounded like an animal of some sort (two clicks), so i shined the flashlight there for a few seconds but saw nothing.  i then went back out to the back porch and shined the flashlight in the direction of the noise i heard outside and saw a very strange, short (approximaty 4' tall), gray, humanoid looking creature with big eyes standing there looking at me for just a second or two. it just dissapeared - it did not run. then i looked up and the craft was also gone - i did not see it leave. i stood there, frozen in fear. my dog would not come outside, which is not normal behavior. i am hard to scare after 30 years on the police force.  i have fbi training as well and i thought i'd seen everything, but this was not normal at all!

my first instinct was to call 911 and i went to the phone, but after picking it up, i put it back down.  i know everyone at the police department and even though we have received a few reports of ufos in the past, i knew they would think i have lost my mind.  but i haven't.  i know what i saw. 

i then locked the entire house up and went to the bedroom, not thinking about the noise i heard in the house before until this morning.  my wife was sound asleep and i did not wake her, and i did not tell her about what happened.  i thought i was gone only 10 -15 minutes but my clock said 4:46 am.  i don't know what happened to the time!  now this morning i have a red sunburn on my face, neck, and arms like i stayed in the sun way too long. i told my wife that i saw a light outside and went to investigate because she is worried about the sunburn. i may go the dr. about it if it doesnlt go away, but won't be able to tell him what i saw.  

i just had to tell someone that this is real and that i'm a 64-year old believer now.
content.summary: Alien and ufo sighting in backyard

content.detailedDescription:
I was approximately ten years old at the time and my family had just moved into a new house. because there was some renovation going on downstairs we were all camped out upstairs in a living room type space with a large window that faced north.
i wasn���t able to fall asleep as quickly as the others so i was looking out the window admiring the night sky. we had just moved from the city (to the suburbs) and seeing lots of stars in the sky was new to me.
i started watching what at first appeared to be a large star (no color difference that i can remember) it started moving across the sky and i though it was a satellite and though how cool that was. but as i continued to watch it, it started moving like nothing else i have ever seen. left, right, up and down moving closer and father away. shooting quickly to a new location then suddenly changing direction at a 90 degree angle and moving slowly. after watching it for a long time i got scared and hid my head under the blanket. i was not able to fall asleep that night until the sun started to come up and the birds were singing.
i just want to note that though i was young at the time i was not dreaming or hallucinating. this was not the work of a young imagination. before that night i had not even though about the possibility of life outside this planet. also this was not a firefly as it did not flicker.
years later when i told a friend that lives in the neighborhood of my experience she recounted a similar sighting at around the same time.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Brightly glowing object doing unusual formations in the night sky
